ygData.subject: RE: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow awesome expedition.  I assume this is before they beefed up the zone last night?  If it was after, then even more impressive.  After they made the zone
ygData.messageBody:
Wow awesome expedition. I assume this is before they beefed up the zone
last night? If it was after, then even more impressive. After they made
the zone even tougher, i heard even groups of your caliber were slaughtered.
And one other question...

The bracers are No Drop did YOU get them???

Shada

> Actually the armour is much more gold looking than yellow and
> it looks very
> nice actually. We found a pair of golden arms from the vile
> plane off of a
> boogyman (yes thats right, a boogyman). They are bard only,
> had excellent
> ac, but gave int as their stat. As far as i always thought
> int sucks for a
> bard so the arms are not that great, besides the pretty gold
> sheen and the
> nice ac. I have heard all kinds of rumors about the plane,
> from you being
> instantly teleported the moment you set your foot in the door by Cazic
> Thule himself to a random location to other assorted garbage.
> Everytime i
> have set foot through that gate i have had no problem as long
> as i dont
> move. We had a very succesful fear expedition that involved
> 23 people, all
> lvl 40-50. We got more than a few stunningly cool pieces of
> equipment and
> had a very fun time with nobody dying. Thats not to say the plane isnt
> freaking rough, there are all manors of things hell bent on
> seperating you
> from your group. Tentacle Tormenters that will belt you 300
> feet straight
> up (some people taking 700pts of dmg when they finally fell
> back down),
> Scarelings that will teleport you randomly away, and little
> bitty toadies
> that like to inflict fear upon you (a more deadly spell in
> that zone i dont
> think exists). We slaughtered a slew of strange beasties
> before we finally
> decided to call it a night and evac'd out (yes there is a
> portal out, no
> you would most likely die trying to get to it).
>
